name: Hot Jon
description:
Take your local-multiplayer versus to the sky and take your rivals down in an aerial combat. Use your guns or lock onto your target, and let your missiles find them. Relax and watch your rivals fail trying to evade your missiles. If these methods are far too uncivilised for your taste then study the menuals to learn hand-to-air combat; you never know, it just might come in handy.

*music will be added soon (your support will help a lot)

Full Game ver:

  • 2-4 players versus
  • single-player friendly
  • requires at least one Xinput controller for multiplayer; up to 4 players
Demo ver:
  • single-player only
  • quick play mode only
  • tiny bit of fun only
